main event: A sighting of an unidentified object was reported, later determined to be the satellite ECHO I.
interesting points: The sighting was reported in a letter to the President of the United States., The observation type was classified as Ground-Visual., The object was seen moving in an easterly direction., The Air Force determined the object to be the satellite ECHO I., The report contained an indication that further information was required for a conclusive determination.
witness description: A person who reported the sighting via letter to the President.
